Jan. 17, 2016 D Butlins Mineworkers (Championship Section)
Butlins Mineworkers (Championship Section) 1 Set Test and Entertainments Contest Butlins Mineworkers butlins-mineworkers-championship-section
Championship
Breath of Souls
Butlins Skegness (Centre Stage), Skegness, Lincolnshire, England, UK Set work: Sat 16th Jan, adj. Berryman/Fowles Entertainment: Sun 17th Jan, adj. Fowles/Rostron
Set Work placing takes precedence in event of tie.
Highest Placed Mining Band: Reg Vardy Most Entertaining Band: Virtuosi GUS Geoff Dove Soloist Award: Chris Jeans (trombone) - Virtuosi GUS Outstanding Soloist: Set Test: David Childs (euphonium) - Flowers Best Basses: Flowers
Butlins Excellence Award: James Shepherd Butlins Bandsperson of the Year: Brian Kirkby
April 3, 2015, 5:24 p.m. Jan. 18, 2016, 7:12 p.m.
1 Flowers Band Paul Holland
2 The GUS Band Adam Cooke
3 Woodfalls Band Robert Childs

5 Desford Colliery Band Tom Davoren
